mapper.sql: id, user_name, name_en, name_zh, password, user_type, pub_salt, enable, status, email, phone, wechat_open_id, wechat_union_id, facebook_id, google_id, twitter_id, linkedin_id, alipay_id, github_id, aws_id, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag

u.id, u.user_name, u.name_en, u.name_zh, u.password, u.user_type, u.pub_salt, u.enable, u.status, u.email, u.phone, u.wechat_open_id, u.wechat_union_id, u.facebook_id, u.google_id, u.twitter_id, u.linkedin_id, u.alipay_id, u.github_id, u.aws_id, u.remark, u.create_by, u.create_date, u.update_by, u.update_date, u.del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where del_flag!=1 and (wechat_union_id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or wechat_open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from sys_user u left join sys_role_user ru on u.id=ru.user_id left join sys_role_user ru2 on ru2.role_id=ru.role_id where u.del_flag!=1 and u.user_name!='root'
AND ru2.user_id=#{userId}
AND ru2.role_id=#{roleId}
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${userName}','%')
AND u.name_zh LIKE CONCAT('%','${nameZh}','%')
group by u.id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, user_name, name_en,name_zh, password, user_type, pub_salt, enable, status, email, phone, wechat_open_id, wechat_union_id, facebook_id, google_id, twitter_id, linkedin_id, alipay_id, github_id, aws_id, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pubSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{facebookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{googleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twitterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkedinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{githubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_zh = #{nameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pub_salt = #{pubSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat_open_id = #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat_union_id = #{wechatUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
facebook_id = #{facebookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
google_id = #{googleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
twitter_id = #{twitterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
linkedin_id = #{linkedinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alipay_id = #{alipayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
github_id = #{githubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aws_id = #{awsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_zh = #{nameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pub_salt = #{pubSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_open_id = #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_union_id = #{wechatUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, facebook_id = #{facebookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, google_id = #{googleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, twitter_id = #{twitterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkedin_id = #{linkedinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay_id = #{alipayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, github_id = #{githubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aws_id = #{awsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
